entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 17. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 27 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
